name: Ganbatte
description:
Ganbatte is a competitive multiplayer game for VR, about cats, in space, eating sushi. Try to eat as much valuable sushi as you can and reach the highest score. Ganbatte brings together hungry sushi cats from across the galaxy. The game is currently in development and will be released as an Early Access title in Q4 2017.Features
  • Quick Match, 4 players competing online
  • Custom Game, host and join your own games
  • Training mode, single-player vs AI
  • Friends and Global Steam Leaderboards
  • Oculus and Vive cross-platform multiplayer
  • 8 different types of sushi
  • Combo system
  • Double conveyor belt, moving in opposite directions
  • Powered by Unreal Engine 4 and Steam
